name: Good Boy 2
description:
Happy birthday...again! Sadly before you have any cake mommy said you have to go see the doctor! What is she thinking? It's your birthday it should be time for cake, time to play with the cats! But don't worry, I'm sure nothing bad will happen..

Good Boy 2 is the sequel to Good Boy 1 and takes place a couple of years after the events of the first game. Featuring a new story and hand drawn graphics.

===Features===

  •  3 new endings that delve into the mystery of the toybox!
  • New combat gameplay!
  • 3 times the amount of cats!

===Controls===

  • E- interact with objects/Next message
  • WASD- Move
  • Left Click- Swing weapon

==Installation guide===

  • Download the Good Boy 2 zip file
  • Extract to a location of your choice
  • Click Good Boy 2.exe to play!
